FUNC.NAME: matrix2of5reportCheckDigit
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the matrix2of5 ReportCheckDigit property which enables reporting of the bar code check digit(s).

PARAM.NAME: matrix2of5reportCheckDigit
PARAM.DESC: Enables/Disables reporting of the check digit. For this property to have any effect matrix2of5verifyCheckDigit needs to be set to true

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only matrix2of5 labels with the ReportCheckDigit property set:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="matrix2of5:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="matrix2of5VerifyCheckDigit:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="matrix2of5ReportCheckDigit:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports matrix2of5.
